channel.title: SFoL 38 - Game Over - Even death may die
channel.description:
## [color=cerulean]Welcome to SFoL 38 - Abyss[/color] *Hosted by Marluxion!*
## [color=cerulean]Abyss?[/color] The main addition to this Special Forum of Lies is a new scum faction. The Abyss.
These twisted mind flayers have risen from the shadowy depths and seek to claim Adiart for their own vile purposes. Our scouts have displayed an abnormal fear upon witnessing such creatures...
Bending the minds of mortal men and slaying our kind without remorse... Some even whisper that they are trying to awaken some kind of Dark God that sleeps beneath the tides...
Their leader was dubbed 'The Dreamer' by one particularly... eccentric... scout. We have reports that he can steal the faces of the men he tortures... So... for all we know, any one of us could be one of these twisted creatures.
### [color=cerulean] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=cerulean] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a Forum PM Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum PM Chain All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=cerulean] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once a player reaches a majority of the accusations, they are put on trial. Trials last 24 hours (ended early if Majority is reached on execute or pardon (or the king decides their fate)) Trials do not extend the day.
### [color=cerulean] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=cerulean] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=cerulean]New Features[/color] New Scum Faction! The Abyss!
[color=cerulean]**Starting Abyss Members**[/color] [details="The Dreamer"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Dreamer [/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Special [/color]** **Unearthly (Passive)** - You are immune to occupation and target changing. You will be informed if someone attempts to occupy you. **Endless Dream (Passive)** - If you die, all living blue dragon will become afraid. **Facestealer (Day)** - Choose a class. You will appear as this class to any investigations. This effect lasts until you use this ability again. - Infinite uses **Mind Rend (Night)** - Convert a player into their Abyss counterpart. - Infinite Uses, 1 night cooldown. **Terror (Night)** - Cause two players to become afraid. This does nothing on it's own, but certain Abyss classes can benefit from fear. Fear lasts until it is removed. - Infinite uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details]
[details="The Devout"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Devout [/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Killer [/color]** **Fear Monger (Passive)** - Whenever a player who is afraid dies, you generate 2 Terror Fragments. You are informed of how many terror fragments you have. After you die, you lose two terror fragments and all Terror Fragments you posses will be passed along to the next Devout. **Cycle of Madness (Passive)** - If you die, the next non-Dreamer Abyss in line will become The Devout. If there exist no other non-Dreamer Abyssians, the next successful convert will instead become The Devout. **He Awakens (Day)** - Consume 20 Terror Fragments. Immediately end the game. Only Abyssians and neutrals who have already won will be victorious. - 1 use **Sacrifice (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses **Empower (Night)** - Consume 6 Terror Fragments. Kill two players. - Infinite uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details]
[color=cerulean]**Abyss Converts**[/color]
[details="The Dominator (Converted from the Knight, Drunk and Butler)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Dominator[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Offensive [/color]** **Hivemind (Passive)** - You are immune to occupation and target changing. **Eldritch Taint (Passive)** - Any targets you visit will become afraid. **Dominate (Night)** - Occupy a player. If they are already afraid, this will bypass occupy immunity. - Infinite uses **Psychic Scream (Night)** - Occupy all players afflicted with Fear. This ability does not visit and bypasses visit prevention. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Knight[/color], [color=steblue]The Drunk[/color] and [color=steblue]The Butler[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Stygian (Converted from the Physician, Squire and Court Wizard)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Stygian[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Support [/color]** **Uncanny Flesh (Passive)** - You are immune to bleeding. **Nightmare (Day)** - Tonight, all members of the Abyss will appear as Blue Dragon to investigations. - 1 use **Bind Essence (Night)** - Heal a member of the abyss from attacks and bleeding tonight. - Infinite uses. **Waves of Madness (Night)** - Prevent all visits to a player. Anyone who attempts to visit them will become afraid. - 3 uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Physician[/color], [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] and [color=steblue]The Squire[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Decadent (Converted from Noble and Mystic)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Decadent[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Social [/color]** **Silence of the Sea (Day)** - Cause a player's vote to execute or pardon to not count today. This will not show up on vote counts, nor will the player be aware. - Infinite uses **Maddening Whisper (Day)** - Send an anonymous 1000 character message to a player. They will also become afraid. - 2 uses **Social Sacrifice (Night)** - Mark a player. If they are executed on trial tomorrow, the Devout will gain 6 Terror Fragments. - 1 use. **Deception (Night)** - Target a player. Tonight, they will show up as an Abyss Killer to investigations. - 2 uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] and [color=steblue]The Mystic[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Lurker (Converted from Observer, Princess and Maid)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Lurker[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Investigative [/color]** **Many Eyes (Day)** - The next time a day ability is used, you will know who used it. - 2 uses **Lurk (Night)** - Follow a player and learn who they visit. If they are afraid, you will also learn who all visits them. - Infinite uses **Infiltrate Cerebrum (Night)** - Learn a player's class. - 2 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Princess[/color], [color=steblue]The Maid[/color] and [color=steblue]The Observer[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Nameless (Converted from the Priest and Hunter)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Nameless[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Special [/color]** **Terrifying Presence (Passive)** - While you are alive, the amount of Terror Fragments that The Devout gains are all doubled. **Sanguine Fear (Day)** - Target a player. If they are afraid, they will begin to bleed and die in two nights. - 2 uses. **Probe Emotion (Day)** - Learn if a player is afraid. - Infinite uses, can be used twice per day. **Terror (Night)** - Cause a player to become afraid. - Infinite uses **Visions of the Deep (Night)** - If all living non-abyss players are afraid, you will change the King into an Eldritch King. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Hunter[/color] and [color=steblue]The Priest[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Eldritch King "] ># [color=cerulean]The Eldritch King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=cerulean]**Abyss Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. - 2 uses **Decide Fate (Day)** - You may choose the whether the player on trial will be executed or pardoned. - 1 use **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Fear (Night)** - Make a player become afraid. - Infinite uses _Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._ --- [/details]
[color=steblue]**The Brave Abyssian Hard Counter!**[/color]
[details="The Therapist"] > # [color = "steblue"] The Therapist[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >**[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Support [/color]** **Brave Soul (Passive)** - Any players you visit will no longer be afraid, and immune to fear for the night. **Therapy (Day)** - Learn if a player is afraid. You will be informed if they become afraid in the future. - 3 uses **Inspect (Night)** - Learn if a player is a member of the Abyss. - Infinite uses **Embrace Vice (Night)** - Prevent all visits to yourself. You will remove fear from yourself if you are afraid. - 2 use *Your objective is to defeat the Abyss and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Convert Immune** [/details]
# [color=cerulean]Other Changes and Things to Note[/color] * The Mercenary isn't around. Some think she chickened out, others say she got a job that fill-ders her purse with Brilders. Regardless, the Mercenary cannot roll in this game.
* Royal Blood isn't on any of the Abyss class cards. Why? Because Royal Blood will now pass on directly if you had it before you were converted!
* Members of the Abyss CAN inflict other Abyssians with fear.
* The Faction cap for the Abyss is 3
* You aren't notified if you are afraid. Only certain special investigative abilities can find that out.
[details="Role List"] [color=gold]**The King (65% Good / 35% Eldritch)**[/color] [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] [color=steblue]**The Therapist**[/color] [color=cerulean]**The Dreamer**[/color] [color=cerulean]**The Devout**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] / [color=grey]**Random Non-Killing Neutral**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Non-Killing Neutral**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Non-Killing Neutral**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Neutral Killer**[/color]
[/details]
# [color=cerulean]Players: [/color] 1. **Icibalus** 2. [color=red]**Firekitten**[/color] - [color=aquamarine]**The Warlock**[/color] - **Died Night 1** 3. **PoisonedSquid** 4. [color=red]**Hjasik**[/color] - [color=cerulean]**The Devout**[/color] - **Died Night 3** 5. **Insanity** 6. **htm** 7. [color=red]**Livicus**[/color] - [color=cerulean]**The Dreamer**[/color] - **Executed Day 3** 8. [color=red]**Margaret**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Good King**[/color] - **Died Night 2** 9. **Alice** 10. **Bazingaboy** 11. **GamerPoke** 12. **Frostwolf103** 13. **MaximusPrime** 14. [color=red]**Noz_Bugz**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Maid**[/color] - **Died Night 1** 15. [color=red]**Invoker**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Mystic**[/color] - **Died Night 3** 16. **Luxy**
Backups: Sam17z, Luxy, eevee
# [color=cerulean]Shortcuts[/color]
[**Start of Game** - Ramblings of a Madman](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-38-abyss-day-1-16-16-alive/72800/210?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 2** - Echo from the Deep](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-38-abyss-day-2-14-16-alive/72800/424?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 3** - Sunken Throne](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-38-abyss-day-3-13-16-alive/72800/993?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 4** - Beneath the Tides...](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-38-abyss-night-3-12-16-alive/72800/1600?u=marluxion) [**The End -** Even Death may Die](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-38-abyss-day-5-7-16-alive/72800/2201?u=marluxion)

item.title: SFoL 38 - Game Over - Even death may die
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Alice:

…are you really all suggesting to pardon and listen to Luxy because of a neutral survivor? Even despite that he’s essentially slipped that he healed n2 and admitted to wanting to create chaos? And that Luxy’s been on Icibalus’, another conf!town’s radar for a while? This is why GKs have DFE, guys. Seriously.

Either way, we still have a convert and the NK to deal with. Squid, Ici, Baz, and me are clear and the only ones remaining are Luxy, Insanity, Frost, and potentially Poke. I’ll DFE Luxy and Squid will jail and execute Insanity. Tomorrow Frost should be lynched and if he somehow flips Knight we’ll move onto Poke. That’ll be game and it’s impossible for us to lose after that.

@MaximusPrime Mind healing me tonight? I’ve been the only reason why Baz has yet to quicklynch you and if the NK ends up winning because town, or more specifically Sam, decides to POE from the top of their townlist due to a chainsaw instead of going through the bottom then I’ll be so damn pissed. Sam’s already flipping tonight so if he ends up being a VI Butler instead of a convert there’s no need to bring another BD down with him.

Marluxion:

The king has decided to end Luxy’s life.

Insert Flavor Later

Marluxion:

Luxy was…

The Physician

Blue Dragon Support
Remedy Studies (Passive) - You are immune to bleeding.
Innoculate (Day) - Prevent a player from being poisoned or bled for the rest of the game. - 1 use
Exhume (Day) - At the end of the night, learn what classes killed a player, or if they committed suicide. - 2 uses
Heal (Night) - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and curing any poison and bleeding they were suffering from. - Infinite uses
Self-Care (Night) - Heal yourself tonight. - 2 uses
Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

He left behind the following last will.

Luxy the Physician

N1: No Action (Wazza)
D2: Inoculate Squid
N2: Heal Squid
N3: Heal Baz

Rudimentary scumreads:
Icibalus - ‘reactiontest’ on maxi seemed fake and forced like he was trying to appear towny. Livi wanted him king, get him to wolf someone.
Gamerpoke - lurking

@orangeandblack5

Read full topic
